text: Kandi mujye musenga Allah (wenyine) kandi ntimukamubangikanye n’icyo ari cyo cyose; mujye mugirira neza ababyeyi, abo mufitanye isano, imfubyi, abakene, umuturanyi mufitanye isano, umuturanyi usanzwe, uwo musangiye urugendo, uri ku rugendo, n’abacakara banyu. Mu by’ukuri, Allah ntakunda umunyagasuzuguro, umwibone
